title: Australia Raises Terror Threat Level From "Possible" To "Probable"
content: Australia on Monday raised its terror threat level to "probable" from "possible", citing an increase in extremist views in the country leading to a more than 50% chance of the planning of an onshore attack in the next 12 months.
summary: Australia on Monday raised its terror threat level to "probable" from "possible", citing an increase in extremist views in the country leading to a more than 50% chance of the planning of an onshore attack in the next 12 months.

title: Dostoevsky To Proust, Pope Francis Lists His Favourite Authors
content: Pope Francis's bookish side emerged Sunday, after the Vatican published a letter in which the pontiff encouraged young priests to read --- while revealing that he himself likes the great tragedies.
summary: Pope Francis's bookish side emerged Sunday, after the Vatican published a letter in which the pontiff encouraged young priests to read --- while revealing that he himself likes the great tragedies.

title: Bangladesh On The Boil Again, 98 Killed, Indefinite Curfew: 10 Points
content: Nearly 100 people were killed after thousands of Bangladeshi protesters - demanding the resignation of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina - clashed with the ruling party supporters yesterday.
summary: Nearly 100 people were killed after thousands of Bangladeshi protesters - demanding the resignation of Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina - clashed with the ruling party supporters yesterday.

title: Iran Could Attack Israel Today, Netanyahu Eyes Preemptive Strike: Report
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken has warned his counterparts from the G7 countries that an attack by Iran and Hezbollah against Israel could commence as early as Monday, Axios reported.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken has warned his counterparts from the G7 countries that an attack by Iran and Hezbollah against Israel could commence as early as Monday, Axios reported.

title: Robert F Kennedy Jr Says He Once Dumped Dead Bear In New York Central Park
content: The independent US presidential candidate said he and his friends were on a falconing excursion in New York state when a van ahead of him hit and killed a six-month-old black bear.
summary: The independent US presidential candidate said he and his friends were on a falconing excursion in New York state when a van ahead of him hit and killed a six-month-old black bear.

title: "You Will Regret Taking Part In This": UK PM Keir Starmer Warns Protesters
content: Unrest related to misinformation about the mass stabbing last Monday in the northwestern English seaside town of Southport has hit multiple towns and cities, with anti-immigration demonstrators clashing with police.
summary: Unrest related to misinformation about the mass stabbing last Monday in the northwestern English seaside town of Southport has hit multiple towns and cities, with anti-immigration demonstrators clashing with police.

title: Mali Cuts Ties With Ukraine Over Alleged Involvement In Rebel Attack
content: Mali is immediately cutting diplomatic ties with Ukraine over comments by a spokesperson for Ukraine's military intelligence agency (GUR) about fighting in its north that killed Malian soldiers and Wagner fighters in late July, it said on Sunday.
summary: Mali is immediately cutting diplomatic ties with Ukraine over comments by a spokesperson for Ukraine's military intelligence agency (GUR) about fighting in its north that killed Malian soldiers and Wagner fighters in late July, it said on Sunday.

title: Kamala Harris Rejects Donald Trump's Offer To Shift Presidential Debate
content: Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has rejected her Republican rival Donald Trump's offer to shift the presidential debate to the Fox News channel, media reports said on Sunday.
summary: Democratic presidential nominee Kamala Harris has rejected her Republican rival Donald Trump's offer to shift the presidential debate to the Fox News channel, media reports said on Sunday.

title: India Issues Advisory For Nationals In Bangladesh After Fresh Violence
content: At least 90 people, including 14 policemen, were killed on Sunday in fierce clashes between security forces personnel and anti-government protesters in different parts of Bangladesh, according to reports from Dhaka.
summary: At least 90 people, including 14 policemen, were killed on Sunday in fierce clashes between security forces personnel and anti-government protesters in different parts of Bangladesh, according to reports from Dhaka.

title: Yemen's Houthis Claim First Attack On Shipping Lanes In 2 Weeks
content: Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthi movement said on Sunday that it targeted a Liberia-flagged container vessel in the Gulf of Aden, claiming its first attack on shipping lanes since Israel carried out a retaliatory airstrike in Hodeidah port on July 20.
summary: Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthi movement said on Sunday that it targeted a Liberia-flagged container vessel in the Gulf of Aden, claiming its first attack on shipping lanes since Israel carried out a retaliatory airstrike in Hodeidah port on July 20.

title: Neuralink Successfully Implanted In 2nd Patient, Working Well: Elon Musk
content: Neuralink has successfully implanted in a second patient its device designed to give paralyzed patients the ability to use digital devices by thinking alone, according to the startup's owner Elon Musk.
summary: Neuralink has successfully implanted in a second patient its device designed to give paralyzed patients the ability to use digital devices by thinking alone, according to the startup's owner Elon Musk.

title: Would Be "Foolish" Not To Have Good Relations With Army, Says Imran Khan
content: Pakistan's jailed former prime minister, Imran Khan, who blames the military for his ouster and 12-month-old imprisonment on what he calls trumped-up charges, said on Sunday it would be "foolish" not to have "excellent" relations with the army.
summary: Pakistan's jailed former prime minister, Imran Khan, who blames the military for his ouster and 12-month-old imprisonment on what he calls trumped-up charges, said on Sunday it would be "foolish" not to have "excellent" relations with the army.

title: 30 Killed After Israeli Strike Hits 2 Schools, Says Gaza Agency
content: Gaza's civil defence agency said an Israeli strike hit two schools in Gaza City on Sunday, killing at least 30 people, while the military reported it had struck Hamas command centres.
summary: Gaza's civil defence agency said an Israeli strike hit two schools in Gaza City on Sunday, killing at least 30 people, while the military reported it had struck Hamas command centres.

title: Video: F-16 Fighter Jets Arrive In Ukraine, Zelensky Says "We Did It"
content: Ukrainian pilots have started flying F-16s for operations within the nation, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Sunday, confirming the long-awaited arrival of the U.S.-made fighter jets more than 29 months since Russia's invasion.
summary: Ukrainian pilots have started flying F-16s for operations within the nation, President Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Sunday, confirming the long-awaited arrival of the U.S.-made fighter jets more than 29 months since Russia's invasion.

title: Warren Buffett Reveals Steve Jobs Called For Investment Tips, Ignored Advice
content: Jobs decided not to follow Mr Buffett's advice. "He didn't do anything, and of course, he didn't want to do anything. He just liked having the cash."
summary: Jobs decided not to follow Mr Buffett's advice. "He didn't do anything, and of course, he didn't want to do anything. He just liked having the cash."

title: Atlantic Ocean's Current System Could Collapse By 2030. Why It's Bad News
content: Scientists emphasize the urgent need for immediate and drastic action to mitigate climate change and potentially stave off this catastrophic tipping point.
summary: Scientists emphasize the urgent need for immediate and drastic action to mitigate climate change and potentially stave off this catastrophic tipping point.

title: Anti-Immigration Protests Rage In UK, Northern Ireland, Dozens Arrested
content: Police arrested dozens of people after protests across parts of England and Northern Ireland turned violent on Saturday, as the government pledged tough action against those it said were exploiting the murder of three girls to stir up disorder.
summary: Police arrested dozens of people after protests across parts of England and Northern Ireland turned violent on Saturday, as the government pledged tough action against those it said were exploiting the murder of three girls to stir up disorder.

title: Bill Gates Was Banned From Being Alone With Interns, Claims Book
content: The book claims that Mr Gates "flirted with some of the interns at the Gates Foundation, putting them in an uncomfortable position."
summary: The book claims that Mr Gates "flirted with some of the interns at the Gates Foundation, putting them in an uncomfortable position."

title: 2 Stabbed To Death In Israel, Hamas Calls It "Natural Response" To Attacks
content: A Palestinian attacker killed two people and wounded two others in a stabbing spree in central Israel on Sunday before being shot dead by police, Israeli authorities said.
summary: A Palestinian attacker killed two people and wounded two others in a stabbing spree in central Israel on Sunday before being shot dead by police, Israeli authorities said.

title: "Highly Volatile" Situation: Foreign Nationals Urged To Leave Lebanon
content: Urgent calls for foreign nationals to leave Lebanon grew on Sunday with France warning of "a highly volatile" situation as Iran and its allies ready their response to high-profile killings blamed on Israel.
summary: Urgent calls for foreign nationals to leave Lebanon grew on Sunday with France warning of "a highly volatile" situation as Iran and its allies ready their response to high-profile killings blamed on Israel.
